law.catch_line: License for buying mussel shells or mussels in the shell.
law.text: No person may engage in the buying of mussel shells or mussels in the shell in this state unless he has in his possession a license authorizing him to do so.
law.history: Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 8, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 365, sec. 14, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 290, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 200, sec. 70, effective June 19, 1952. -- Created 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 50, sec. 1(1).
